import React, { Component } from "react"; import './assets/images/favicon.ico'; import './assets/css/graindashboard.css'; import Header from "./Header"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import Champ from "./Champ"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import useData from "../route/useData"; import Link from "../route/route"; const Ficheenchere = () => { const { idenchere } = useParams(); const link = Link.getUseLink(); const data = useData(link + "fichesenchere/", idenchere); return
  2. Produit

Fiche de l'encheres

{data.map(item => (
{/* */}

Description de l'objet a vendre: {item.description}

Description de l'enchere: {item.descriptionenchere}

Duree: {item.duree} heures

Debut: {item.dateheureenchere}

Fin: {item.datefin}

{/*
*/}
))}
} export default Ficheenchere;
